product_development.heading: Product Development Training
product_development.description: Our experience has helped companies launched, establish a feedback loop, built teams and generate revenue, from their products. We guide companies to build products their users love.

topics.heading: Have you Launched?
topics.description: Most products never make it out the door, due to lack of understanding of product the product lifecycle. Knowing when you have enough features to launch can make all the difference.

topics.heading: Feedback Loop
topics.description: Establishing a feedback loop is key, to your product and business. Understanding who your customers are and how they're using your product is key to the survival of a product.

topics.heading: Market Fit
topics.description: Do you have product market fit? Or are you still finding it? How do you know when you have product market fit? Should you pivot or stay on course?

topics.heading: Great Culture Grows Businesses
topics.description: Does your company have a hard time attracting talent? How do you improve the internal culture? Do you have a hiring pipeline? Establishing a great culture is the key to growing a team.

technical_consulting.heading: Technical Consulting
technical_consulting.description: We have the unique experience of product development and technical consulting under one roof. This means we can help you with making the right technical choices to ensure that you succeed in the market.

disciplines.heading: Application Development
disciplines.description: Some technologies we love for application development

technologies.name: Ruby / Rails
technologies.description: Ruby on Rails is still one of the greatest frameworks for getting started building businesses with. The wide array of existing stable libraries will allow businesses to launch faster.

technologies.name: Elixir / Phoenix
technologies.description: If your business requires lots of concurrent connection, and robust networking stack, elixir and phoenix is a great choice.

technologies.name: Javascript / React
technologies.description: Need something with a beautiful UI? React and Javascript is a great stack. Leverage the huge ecosystem to build user-interface that's cross platform and friendly to your users.

disciplines.heading: DevOps & Infrastructure
disciplines.description: Great DevOps is key for building businesses that iterate quickly and putting agile development into practice.

technologies.name: Alpine Linux
technologies.description: We deploy our applications using alpine linux due to it's small size and robust package management system

technologies.name: LXD
technologies.description: A container engine that's simple but powerful. Allows us to orchestrate and deploy our apps quickly.

technologies.name: Terraform
technologies.description: Amazing tool for orchestrating turning infrastructure into code. With terraform scripts you can orchestrate anything from an infrastructure level all the way up to the application stack.

disciplines.heading: Application Scalability
disciplines.description: So now that you are growing, can your application handle the amount of users? Or is it struggling. Your application should not stop the growth of your business.

technologies.name: Response Time Optimization
technologies.description: Getting your application to respond quickly is one of the key factors to scalability, if you have a lot of users, and your server can respond quickly it can serve more users. Simple.

technologies.name: Stateless Application
technologies.description: Once you've optimized every last drop out of your application, it will be important to make sure that you application is stateless so you can scale out horizontally to handle more load.

technologies.name: Architectural Optimization
technologies.description: Is your architecture overly complex? Can it be simplified? A simpler architecture is easier to scale. We'll take a look at what you have an suggest ideas on how tou can simplify and optimize the stack.

disciplines.heading: Project Management
disciplines.description: Iterating through a product and getting it to the point where it generates revenue and maintains great retention should be managed like a well oiled machine.

technologies.name: Iterative Workflow
technologies.description: Having a workflow that is robust and easy for the team to follow is the key to a well oiled iterative cycle or sprints.

technologies.name: Handling Technical Debt
technologies.description: Technical Debt can destroy your business, how do you know when you have too much debt? How can you deal with it while still move forward.

technologies.name: Business and Technical Exellence
technologies.description: Having balance between business and technical excellence is the key to a long lasting technical product. How do you balance the time between achiving business excellence and technical excellence?

continuous_improvement.heading: We're dedicated to Continuous Improvement
continuous_improvement.description: Getting everything done all at once is impossible, however with the right process, and the right know-how getting meaningful work done, overtime can achieve exceptional results.
